title: Asana
description: This is the interface for interacting with the [Asana Platform](https://developers.asana.com). Our API reference is generated from our [OpenAPI spec] (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Asana/developer-docs/master/defs/asana_oas.yaml).

oauth2.label:
We require that applications designed to access the Asana API on behalf of multiple users implement OAuth 2.0.
Asana supports the Authorization Code Grant flow.

auth_personalAccessToken.label: personalAccessToken (undefined)
auth_personalAccessToken.note: A personal access token allows access to the api for the user who created it. This should be kept a secret and be treated like a password.

getAttachmentsForTask.title: Get attachments for a task
getAttachmentsForTask.description: Returns the compact records for all attachments on the task

getAuditLogEvents.title: Get audit log events
getAuditLogEvents.description: Retrieve the audit log events that have been captured in your domain

getCustomFieldSettingsForProject.title: Get a project's custom fields
getCustomFieldSettingsForProject.description: Returns a list of all of the custom fields settings on a project, in compact form

getCustomFieldSettingsForPortfolio.title: Get a portfolio's custom fields
getCustomFieldSettingsForPortfolio.description: Returns a list of all of the custom fields settings on a portfolio, in compact form

getCustomFieldsForWorkspace.title: Get a workspace's custom fields
getCustomFieldsForWorkspace.description: Returns a list of the compact representation of all of the custom fields in a workspace

getEvents.title: Get events on a resource
getEvents.description:
Returns the full record for all events that have occurred since the sync
token was created

getSubgoalsForGoal.title: Get subgoals from a goal
getSubgoalsForGoal.description: Returns a compact representation of all of the subgoals of a goal

supportingWork.title: Get supporting work from a goal
supportingWork.description: Returns any portfolios or projects associated with specified goal

getParentGoalsForGoal.title: Get parent goals from a goal
getParentGoalsForGoal.description: Returns a compact representation of all of the parent goals of a goal

getPortfolioMemberships.title: Get multiple portfolio memberships
getPortfolioMemberships.description: Returns a list of portfolio memberships in compact representation

getPortfolioMembershipsForPortfolio.title: Get memberships from a portfolio
getPortfolioMembershipsForPortfolio.description: Returns the compact portfolio membership records for the portfolio

getPortfolios.title: Get multiple portfolios
getPortfolios.description: Returns a list of the portfolios in compact representation that are owned by the current API user

getItemsForPortfolio.title: Get portfolio items
getItemsForPortfolio.description: Get a list of the items in compact form in a portfolio

getProjectMembershipsForProject.title: Get memberships from a project
getProjectMembershipsForProject.description: Returns the compact project membership records for the project

getProjectStatusesForProject.title: Get statuses from a project
getProjectStatusesForProject.description: Returns the compact project status update records for all updates on the project

getProjects.title: Get multiple projects
getProjects.description: Returns the compact project records for some filtered set of projects

getProjectsForTask.title: Get projects a task is in
getProjectsForTask.description: Returns a compact representation of all of the projects the task is in

getProjectsForTeam.title: Get a team's projects
getProjectsForTeam.description: Returns the compact project records for all projects in the team

getProjectsForWorkspace.title: Get all projects in a workspace
getProjectsForWorkspace.description: Returns the compact project records for all projects in the workspace

getTaskCountsForProject.title: Get task count of a project
getTaskCountsForProject.description: Get an object that holds task count fields

getSectionsForProject.title: Get sections in a project
getSectionsForProject.description: Returns the compact records for all sections in the specified project

getStoriesForTask.title: Get stories from a task
getStoriesForTask.description: Returns the compact records for all stories on the task

getTags.title: Get multiple tags
getTags.description: Returns the compact tag records for some filtered set of tags

getTagsForTask.title: Get a task's tags
getTagsForTask.description: Get a compact representation of all of the tags the task has

getTagsForWorkspace.title: Get tags in a workspace
getTagsForWorkspace.description: Returns the compact tag records for some filtered set of tags

getTasks.title: Get multiple tasks
getTasks.description: Returns the compact task records for some filtered set of tasks

getTasksForProject.title: Get tasks from a project
getTasksForProject.description: Returns the compact task records for all tasks within the given project, ordered by their priority within the project

getTasksForSection.title: Get tasks from a section
getTasksForSection.description: *Board view only*: Returns the compact section records for all tasks within the given section

getTasksForTag.title: Get tasks from a tag
getTasksForTag.description: Returns the compact task records for all tasks with the given tag

getTasksForUserTaskList.title: Get tasks from a user task list
getTasksForUserTaskList.description: Returns the compact list of tasks in a user's My Tasks list

getSubtasksForTask.title: Get subtasks from a task
getSubtasksForTask.description: Returns a compact representation of all of the subtasks of a task

getDependenciesForTask.title: Get dependencies from a task
getDependenciesForTask.description: Returns the compact representations of all of the dependencies of a task

getDependentsForTask.title: Get dependents from a task
getDependentsForTask.description: Returns the compact representations of all of the dependents of a task

searchTasksForWorkspace.title: Search tasks in a workspace
searchTasksForWorkspace.description: To mirror the functionality of the Asana web app's advanced search feature, the Asana API has a task search endpoint that allows you to build complex filters to find and retrieve the exact data you need

getTeamMembershipsForTeam.title: Get memberships from a team
getTeamMembershipsForTeam.description: Returns the compact team memberships for the team

getTeamMembershipsForUser.title: Get memberships from a user
getTeamMembershipsForUser.description: Returns the compact team membership records for the user

getTeamsForOrganization.title: Get teams in an organization
getTeamsForOrganization.description: Returns the compact records for all teams in the organization visible to the authorized user

getTeamsForUser.title: Get teams for a user
getTeamsForUser.description: Returns the compact records for all teams to which the given user is assigned

typeaheadForWorkspace.title: Get objects via typeahead
typeaheadForWorkspace.description:
Retrieves objects in the workspace based via an auto-completion/typeahead
search algorithm

getUserTaskListForUser.title: Get a user's task list
getUserTaskListForUser.description: Returns the full record for a user's task list

getUsers.title: Get multiple users
getUsers.description: Returns the user records for all users in all workspaces and organizations accessible to the authenticated user

getFavoritesForUser.title: Get a user's favorites
getFavoritesForUser.description: Returns all of a user's favorites in the given workspace, of the given type

getUsersForTeam.title: Get users in a team
getUsersForTeam.description: Returns the compact records for all users that are members of the team

getUsersForWorkspace.title: Get users in a workspace or organization
getUsersForWorkspace.description: Returns the compact records for all users in the specified workspace or organization

getWebhooks.title: Get multiple webhooks
getWebhooks.description: Get the compact representation of all webhooks your app has registered for the authenticated user in the given workspace

getWorkspaceMembershipsForUser.title: Get workspace memberships for a user
getWorkspaceMembershipsForUser.description: Returns the compact workspace membership records for the user

getWorkspaceMembershipsForWorkspace.title: Get the workspace memberships for a workspace
getWorkspaceMembershipsForWorkspace.description: Returns the compact workspace membership records for the workspace

getWorkspaces.title: Get multiple workspaces
getWorkspaces.description: Returns the compact records for all workspaces visible to the authorized user

getAttachment.title: Get an attachment
getAttachment.description: Get the full record for a single attachment

createBatchRequest.title: Submit parallel requests
createBatchRequest.description: Make multiple requests in parallel to Asana's API

createCustomField.title: Create a custom field
createCustomField.description: Creates a new custom field in a workspace

getCustomField.title: Get a custom field
getCustomField.description: Get the complete definition of a custom field's metadata

updateCustomField.title: Update a custom field
updateCustomField.description: A specific, existing custom field can be updated by making a PUT request on the URL for that custom field

deleteCustomField.title: Delete a custom field
deleteCustomField.description: A specific, existing custom field can be deleted by making a DELETE request on the URL for that custom field

createEnumOptionForCustomField.title: Create an enum option
createEnumOptionForCustomField.description: Creates an enum option and adds it to this custom field's list of enum options

insertEnumOptionForCustomField.title: Reorder a custom field's enum
insertEnumOptionForCustomField.description: Moves a particular enum option to be either before or after another specified enum option in the custom field

getGoal.title: Get a goal
getGoal.description: Returns the complete goal record for a single goal

updateGoal.title: Update a goal
updateGoal.description:
An existing goal can be updated by making a PUT request on the URL for
that goal

deleteGoal.title: Delete a goal
deleteGoal.description: A specific, existing goal can be deleted by making a DELETE request on the URL for that goal

createGoal.title: Create a goal
createGoal.description: Creates a new goal in a workspace or team

createGoalMetric.title: Create a goal metric
createGoalMetric.description: Creates and adds a goal metric to a specified goal

updateGoalMetric.title: Update a goal metric
updateGoalMetric.description:
Updates a goal's existing metric's `current_number_value` if one exists,
otherwise responds with a 400 status code

addSubgoal.title: Add a subgoal to a parent goal
addSubgoal.description: Adds a subgoal to a parent goal

removeSubgoal.title: Remove a subgoal from a goal
removeSubgoal.description: Removes a goal as a subgoal of a specified parent goal

addFollowers.title: Add a collaborator to a goal

removeFollowers.title: Remove a collaborator from a goal

addSupportingWorkForGoal.title: Add a project/portfolio as supporting work for a goal.
addSupportingWorkForGoal.description: Adds a project or portfolio as supporting work for a goal

removeSupportingWorkForGoal.title: Remove a project/portfolio as supporting work for a goal.
removeSupportingWorkForGoal.description: Removes a project or portfolio as supporting work for a goal

getJob.title: Get a job by id
getJob.description: Returns the full record for a job

createOrganizationExport.title: Create an organization export request
createOrganizationExport.description: This method creates a request to export an Organization

getOrganizationExport.title: Get details on an org export request
getOrganizationExport.description: Returns details of a previously-requested Organization export

getPortfolioMembership.title: Get a portfolio membership
getPortfolioMembership.description: Returns the complete portfolio record for a single portfolio membership

createPortfolio.title: Create a portfolio
createPortfolio.description: Creates a new portfolio in the given workspace with the supplied name

getPortfolio.title: Get a portfolio
getPortfolio.description: Returns the complete portfolio record for a single portfolio

updatePortfolio.title: Update a portfolio
updatePortfolio.description:
An existing portfolio can be updated by making a PUT request on the URL for
that portfolio

deletePortfolio.title: Delete a portfolio
deletePortfolio.description:
An existing portfolio can be deleted by making a DELETE request on
the URL for that portfolio

addItemForPortfolio.title: Add a portfolio item
addItemForPortfolio.description: Add an item to a portfolio

removeItemForPortfolio.title: Remove a portfolio item
removeItemForPortfolio.description: Remove an item from a portfolio

addCustomFieldSettingForPortfolio.title: Add a custom field to a portfolio
addCustomFieldSettingForPortfolio.description: Custom fields are associated with portfolios by way of custom field settings

removeCustomFieldSettingForPortfolio.title: Remove a custom field from a portfolio
removeCustomFieldSettingForPortfolio.description: Removes a custom field setting from a portfolio

addMembersForPortfolio.title: Add users to a portfolio
addMembersForPortfolio.description: Adds the specified list of users as members of the portfolio

removeMembersForPortfolio.title: Remove users from a portfolio
removeMembersForPortfolio.description: Removes the specified list of users from members of the portfolio

getProjectMembership.title: Get a project membership
getProjectMembership.description: Returns the complete project record for a single project membership

getProjectStatus.title: Get a project status
getProjectStatus.description: Returns the complete record for a single status update

deleteProjectStatus.title: Delete a project status
deleteProjectStatus.description: Deletes a specific, existing project status update

createProjectStatusForProject.title: Create a project status
createProjectStatusForProject.description: Creates a new status update on the project

createProject.title: Create a project
createProject.description: Create a new project in a workspace or team

getProject.title: Get a project
getProject.description: Returns the complete project record for a single project

updateProject.title: Update a project
updateProject.description:
A specific, existing project can be updated by making a PUT request on
the URL for that project

deleteProject.title: Delete a project
deleteProject.description:
A specific, existing project can be deleted by making a DELETE request on
the URL for that project

duplicateProject.title: Duplicate a project
duplicateProject.description: Creates and returns a job that will asynchronously handle the duplication

createProjectForTeam.title: Create a project in a team
createProjectForTeam.description: Creates a project shared with the given team

createProjectForWorkspace.title: Create a project in a workspace
createProjectForWorkspace.description: Returns the compact project records for all projects in the workspace

addCustomFieldSettingForProject.title: Add a custom field to a project
addCustomFieldSettingForProject.description: Custom fields are associated with projects by way of custom field settings

removeCustomFieldSettingForProject.title: Remove a custom field from a project
removeCustomFieldSettingForProject.description: Removes a custom field setting from a project

addMembersForProject.title: Add users to a project
addMembersForProject.description: Adds the specified list of users as members of the project

removeMembersForProject.title: Remove users from a project
removeMembersForProject.description: Removes the specified list of users from members of the project

addFollowersForProject.title: Add followers to a project
addFollowersForProject.description: Adds the specified list of users as followers to the project

removeFollowersForProject.title: Remove followers from a project
removeFollowersForProject.description: Removes the specified list of users from following the project, this will not affect project membership status

getSection.title: Get a section
getSection.description: Returns the complete record for a single section

updateSection.title: Update a section
updateSection.description:
A specific, existing section can be updated by making a PUT request on
the URL for that project

deleteSection.title: Delete a section
deleteSection.description:
A specific, existing section can be deleted by making a DELETE request on
the URL for that section

createSectionForProject.title: Create a section in a project
createSectionForProject.description: Creates a new section in a project

addTaskForSection.title: Add task to section
addTaskForSection.description: Add a task to a specific, existing section

insertSectionForProject.title: Move or Insert sections
insertSectionForProject.description: Move sections relative to each other

getStory.title: Get a story
getStory.description: Returns the full record for a single story

updateStory.title: Update a story
updateStory.description: Updates the story and returns the full record for the updated story

createStoryForTask.title: Create a story on a task
createStoryForTask.description: Adds a story to a task

createTag.title: Create a tag
createTag.description: Creates a new tag in a workspace or organization

getTag.title: Get a tag
getTag.description: Returns the complete tag record for a single tag

updateTag.title: Update a tag
updateTag.description: Updates the properties of a tag

deleteTag.title: Delete a tag
deleteTag.description:
A specific, existing tag can be deleted by making a DELETE request on
the URL for that tag

createTagForWorkspace.title: Create a tag in a workspace
createTagForWorkspace.description: Creates a new tag in a workspace or organization

createTask.title: Create a task
createTask.description:
Creating a new task is as easy as POSTing to the `/tasks` endpoint with a
data block containing the fields you'd like to set on the task

getTask.title: Get a task
getTask.description: Returns the complete task record for a single task

updateTask.title: Update a task
updateTask.description:
A specific, existing task can be updated by making a PUT request on the
URL for that task

deleteTask.title: Delete a task
deleteTask.description:
A specific, existing task can be deleted by making a DELETE request on
the URL for that task

duplicateTask.title: Duplicate a task
duplicateTask.description: Creates and returns a job that will asynchronously handle the duplication

createSubtaskForTask.title: Create a subtask
createSubtaskForTask.description: Creates a new subtask and adds it to the parent task

setParentForTask.title: Set the parent of a task
setParentForTask.description: parent, or no parent task at all

addDependenciesForTask.title: Set dependencies for a task
addDependenciesForTask.description: Marks a set of tasks as dependencies of this task, if they are not already dependencies

removeDependenciesForTask.title: Unlink dependencies from a task
removeDependenciesForTask.description: Unlinks a set of dependencies from this task

addDependentsForTask.title: Set dependents for a task
addDependentsForTask.description: Marks a set of tasks as dependents of this task, if they are not already dependents

removeDependentsForTask.title: Unlink dependents from a task
removeDependentsForTask.description: Unlinks a set of dependents from this task

addProjectForTask.title: Add a project to a task
addProjectForTask.description:
Adds the task to the specified project, in the optional location
specified

removeProjectForTask.title: Remove a project from a task
removeProjectForTask.description: Removes the task from the specified project

addTagForTask.title: Add a tag to a task
addTagForTask.description: Adds a tag to a task

removeTagForTask.title: Remove a tag from a task
removeTagForTask.description: Removes a tag from a task

removeFollowerForTask.title: Remove followers from a task
removeFollowerForTask.description: Removes each of the specified followers from the task if they are following

getTeamMembership.title: Get a team membership
getTeamMembership.description: Returns the complete team membership record for a single team membership

createTeam.title: Create a team
createTeam.description: Creates a team within the current workspace

getTeam.title: Get a team
getTeam.description: Returns the full record for a single team

addUserForTeam.title: Add a user to a team
addUserForTeam.description: The user making this call must be a member of the team in order to add others

removeUserForTeam.title: Remove a user from a team
removeUserForTeam.description: The user making this call must be a member of the team in order to remove themselves or others

getTimePeriod.title: Get a time period
getTimePeriod.description: Returns the full record for a single time period

getUserTaskList.title: Get a user task list
getUserTaskList.description: Returns the full record for a user task list

getUser.title: Get a user
getUser.description: Returns the full user record for the single user with the provided ID

createWebhook.title: Establish a webhook
createWebhook.description: Establishing a webhook is a two-part process

getWebhook.title: Get a webhook
getWebhook.description: Returns the full record for the given webhook

updateWebhook.title: Update a webhook
updateWebhook.description: An existing webhook's filters can be updated by making a PUT request on the URL for that webhook

getWorkspaceMembership.title: Get a workspace membership
getWorkspaceMembership.description: Returns the complete workspace record for a single workspace membership

getWorkspace.title: Get a workspace
getWorkspace.description: Returns the full workspace record for a single workspace

updateWorkspace.title: Update a workspace
updateWorkspace.description: A specific, existing workspace can be updated by making a PUT request on the URL for that workspace

addUserForWorkspace.title: Add a user to a workspace or organization
addUserForWorkspace.description: Add a user to a workspace or organization

removeUserForWorkspace.title: Remove a user from a workspace or organization
removeUserForWorkspace.description: Remove a user from a workspace or organization
